message: Hello Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $18,000.
Alice, your offer is a bit steep for me.  I'm interested in the product, but my budget is around $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $14,000.  This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still out of my price range. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $12,000.  If that doesn't work, I'll have to look at other options.
